entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
